string.value: Karcasa has information on Mushroom Castle. You'd better go talk to him.
Karcasa claims he'll remember information about the Mushroom Castle if he eats some carrots right now… Really? \r\n
You gathered the carrots and gave them to Karcasa in exchange for information about the Mushroom Castle.
Are you interested in a special route that'll take you directly back to Victoria Island?\r\n#b#L0#Do you know anything about Mushroom Castle?#l\n#k

You know, I've been getting so many inquiries about the Mushroom Castle these days. Someone asks me about it every five minutes. It's really tiring me out. Making my brain hurt, you know? Thing is, I can't remember anything about the castle right this moment. I haven't the foggiest about a betrayal of the spores or anything of that sort... Hmmm… You know, I have a hunch that I do know something. Just can't remember what. Perhaps if I eat some carrots, say, 30 of them, it'll jog my memory. I hear they're good for the brain.
You can find carrots by defeating #bBrown Sand Rabbits#k, just saying. You know, making conversation. Though I'm sure 30 of them would definitely get my memory running again.
Guess you're not as interested about Mushroom Castle as you said you were...
Hmm? Oh, was I supposed to give you some information about the Mushroom Castle? Let's see… Mushroom Castle...
Still short on carrots? You know, the information about the Castle is on the tip of my brain…
